page.title: 15BIOGRAPHY
page.content: {Mr.Pelmear}is well known in{Cornwall for writing{Cornish music.}He writes music for the piano,organ and bands. {Mr.Pelmear}became interested in music when he was about 4 or 5 when he took an elastic band to bed to twang it and make different tunes.He started playing the piano when he was 10 and started to write music when he was 12. {Mr.Pelmear}can now play the piano, organ and a few brass instruments.He writes music with a{Cornish flavour reflecting{Cornwall's}past and dramatic scenery. He also writes music for special occasions like the{St.Day {Feast. { Mr.Pelmear}has also written books about{rugby.}When he was at school he played for{Cornwall.}He played fly half,centre and wing.
